posts.title: Sunita Williams and Barry Wilmore: Return of the spacewalkers
posts.body: The NASA astronauts, who returned to earth after nine months in space, have something of an entrepreneurial spirit, guided by the ‘one step at a time’ ethos and backed up by hard yards in the military and the rigours of being test pilots

posts.title: Greenlanders unite to fend off U.S. as Trump seeks control of Arctic island
posts.body: In the wake of second lady Usha Vance’s visit to Greenland, locals are increasingly worried that their homeland has become a pawn after the re-election of U.S. President Donald Trump

posts.title: Russia says new Black Sea deal is possible with certain conditions
posts.body: Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov said that any new agreement would need to have strict conditions attached to it
